name: Diner to Door by Niharika
description:
Diner To Door is a fancy restaurant that seeks to deliver a variety of healthy and nutritious food to users. Due to the pandemic and its associated social distancing measures most individuals are hesitant to go out of their houses. Diner To Door App is designed specifically for such people enabling them to have restaurant-prepared cuisine delivered to their homes. Before placing an order, customers can check the ingredients used to prepare the food, their nutrition facts, and previous user feedback. It also lets people to reserve seats in the restaurant, guaranteeing that only the required amount of people dine at any given moment, assuring a safe dining experience.

To view case study visit UX BY NIHARIKA
